sections.title: Introduction
sections.content: This Feature Policy describes Kumba's functionalities, providing detailed insights on how the platform operates, how users can interact with the features, and the safeguards in place to ensure a secure and efficient user experience. By using Kumba, you agree to adhere to these policies and to use the services responsibly.

sections.title: Search Functionality
sections.content: Kumba offers a comprehensive search system designed to make it easy for users to find housing that meets their specific needs. The search functionality includes multiple filters and interactive tools that allow users to narrow down their options. Here are some of the key search features:

features.title: Search by Location :
features.content: Users can enter a city, neighborhood, or even a specific address to search for properties. Location-based search is integrated with Google Maps to provide accurate geographical results.

features.title: Search by Price Range :
features.content: Users can filter properties based on their budget. A slider allows users to set a minimum and maximum price range, so only properties that fit within those parameters are shown.

features.title: Property Type Filters :
features.content: Users can filter properties by type, such as apartments, houses, villas, studios, or commercial spaces, to find properties that meet their specific needs.

features.title: Advanced Filters :
features.content: Users can apply additional filters to refine their results even further, such as number of bedrooms, total area, amenities (parking, balcony, or pool), furnished or unfurnished properties, and pet-friendly properties.

features.title: Map-Based Search :
features.content: The interactive map allows users to view available properties by location. Users can click on map markers to view property details without leaving the map view.

features.title: Saved Searches :
features.content: Users can save their search criteria for future use. Kumba will notify them when new listings that match their criteria become available.

sections.title: Account Management
sections.content: Creating an account on Kumba enhances the overall experience by providing access to additional features. Account management on Kumba is designed to be user-friendly and secure, ensuring that users can manage their activities and personal information effectively.

features.title: Account Creation
features.content: Users can create an account using their email address or opt to sign up via third-party services like Google or Facebook for quicker access. All personal data provided is securely stored and protected by encryption.

features.title: Profile Customization
features.content: Users can create a profile reflecting their preferences, including housing types, areas of interest, and price ranges. This allows Kumba to tailor its recommendations, making the search process more efficient.

features.title: Favorites and Wishlists
features.content: Users can save properties to their favorites list for later review or comparison. This feature is useful for tracking properties across different searches and helps facilitate the final decision-making process.

features.title: Notifications and Alerts
features.content: Users can set up personalized notifications when new properties that meet their criteria become available. These notifications can be sent via email, SMS, or push notifications. Users can also set up alerts for property price changes or new special offers.

features.title: Account Security
features.content: Kumba uses industry-level security measures, including two-factor authentication (2FA) and encryption of login credentials. Users can update their password at any time or recover their account through a secure email verification process in case of lost credentials.

features.title: Account Deletion
features.content: Users can delete their account at any time from the settings page. Once deleted, all personal data, saved properties, and search history are permanently removed from Kumba's databases.

sections.title: Property Listing and Ad Management
sections.content: Kumba offers a robust platform for property owners and real estate agencies to list their properties. This section describes the process for creating and managing property listings:

features.title: Ad Creation
features.content: Property owners can create listings by providing detailed information about their property. This includes the property description, location, price, availability, photos, and amenities. The listing creation process is intuitive and includes step-by-step instructions to ensure all essential information is provided.

features.title: Photo and Video Upload
features.content: Listings can include high-resolution photos and videos of the property, offering potential renters or buyers a visual tour before scheduling a visit. Kumba supports virtual tours and 360-degree views for an immersive experience.

features.title: Ad Promotion
features.content: Property owners can choose to promote their listings for increased visibility. Promoted listings appear at the top of search results and on the homepage, attracting more views.

features.title: Listing Management
features.content: Property owners and agencies can edit or delete their listings at any time. This includes updating prices, availability, and any other details related to the property.

features.title: Compliance with Legal Standards
features.content: All listings must comply with local laws and regulations, including fair housing laws. Listings that violate these standards will be removed, and repeated violations may result in account suspension.

sections.title: Communication Tools
sections.content: Kumba offers integrated communication tools to facilitate interaction between property owners and potential renters or buyers. These tools include:

features.title: Direct Messaging
features.content: Users can send messages directly to property owners via the platform to request information about properties, schedule visits, or negotiate prices.

features.title: Appointment Scheduling
features.content: Kumba integrates a calendar system that allows users to schedule property visits. Property owners and agents can set their availability, and users can choose a time that suits them.

features.title: Call and Email Options
features.content: In addition to messaging, users can choose to contact property owners by phone or email through the platform's secure communication options.

sections.title: Data Security
sections.content: At Kumba, user data security is a top priority. We take extensive measures to protect personal information and ensure that all data management practices adhere to the latest industry standards and legal regulations.

features.title: Data Encryption
features.content: All sensitive user data, such as passwords and payment details, are encrypted in transit and at rest. This ensures that even in the unlikely event of a data breach, user information remains protected.

features.title: GDPR Compliance
features.content: Kumba adheres to the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) standards, ensuring users have full control over their personal data. Users can request access to their data or completely delete it from our systems at any time.

features.title: Secure Payment Processing
features.content: For users making payments via Kumba, we work with trusted payment processors who adhere to PCI-DSS standards to protect financial transactions.

features.title: Data Minimization
features.content: Kumba only collects data necessary for providing its services. We do not sell user data to third parties or use it for purposes other than those specified in our privacy policy.

sections.title: Support and Assistance
sections.content: Kumba offers comprehensive support services to assist users with any questions or issues they may encounter. Our support team is available through multiple channels:

features.title: Online Help Center
features.content: Kumba’s Help Center includes a detailed FAQ section, user guides, and troubleshooting tips. It is available 24/7.

features.title: Email Support
features.content: Users can contact support via email at support@kumba.com, and our team will respond within 24 hours.

features.title: Live Chat
features.content: For immediate assistance, users can access our live chat service, available during business hours.

conclusion.title: Conclusion
conclusion.content: By using Kumba, users agree to these feature policies and understand that they are in place to ensure a safe and user-friendly experience. If you have any questions or need further clarification, please contact our support team.
